mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (username, account, phone, `password`, enabled, createtime, city, county, area, resident, `type`, address, long_itude, lat_itude, agency_name, owner_id) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{county,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resident,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longItude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latItude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{agencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county = #{county,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resident = #{resident,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, long_itude = #{longItude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat_itude = #{latItude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, agency_name = #{agencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, account, phone, `password`, enabled, createtime, city, county, area, resident, `type`, address, long_itude, lat_itude, agency_name, owner_id from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, account, phone, `password`, enabled, createtime, city, county, area, resident, `type`, address, long_itude, lat_itude, agency_name, owner_id from user
